alert.note: Alert for Chukchi Sea Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued January 02 at 3:44AM AKST until January 02 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKST TODAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions occuring. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. Visibility near zero at times. * WHERE...Point Hope. * WHEN...Until noon AKST today. * IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult. Areas of blowing snow will reduce visibility to one quarter mile or less at times. Large snow drifts will form. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest winds and lowest visibility are expected early this morning.
info.instruction: A Blizzard Warning means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. Falling and blowing snow with strong winds and poor visibilities are likely. This will lead to whiteout conditions, making travel extremely difficult.
